610110.name: Love Story: Letters from the Past
610110.description:
Discover a wonderful Love Story in this fantastic Hidden Object game! Travel back in time and relive a beautiful tale of romance. Mary has received an anonymous package containing love letters that are over 30 years old! Track down the letters and help Mary piece together the wonderful memories of her first husband. Complete fun minigames in Love Story: Letters from the Past to unravel a timeless love story.

Romantic story
Multiple minigames
Live a Love Story!
610110.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
